alert.note: Alert for Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 4:26PM EST until November 16 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...A period of heavy, wet, wind-driven snow with rapidly fluctuating visibilities is expected. Snowfall rates of around 1 to 2 inches per hour are expected to lead to sharp visibility reductions and snow covered roads. * WHERE...Porter County, particularly northeastern portions of the county. * WHEN...Through 7 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on sharply reduced visibilities and slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the afternoon commute, including the I-80/90 and I-94 corridors.
info.instruction: Slow down, increase following distance, and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
